result.eng: What is the cure to the problem?
result.ga: cad é leigheas na faidhbe

result.eng: There is no easy cure for cancer.
result.ga: níl aon leigheas éasca ar an ailse
result.orig: níl aon leigheas éasca ar an ailse
result.html: níl aon leigheas éasca ar an ailseThere is no easy cure for cancer.
result.ponchtml: níl aon leiġeas éasca ar an ailseThere is no easy cure for cancer.

result.eng: The only cure for love is marriage.
result.ga: níl leigheas ar ghrá ach pósadh
result.orig: níl leigheas ar ghrá ach pósadh
result.html: níl leigheas ar ghrá ach pósadhThe only cure for love is marriage.
result.ponchtml: níl leiġeas ar ġrá aċ pósaḋThe only cure for love is marriage.

result.eng: Doctors give them medicines which give them relief but do not cure them.
result.ga: tugann dochtúirí cógas dóibh a thugann faoiseamh dóibh ach nach leigheasann iad
result.orig: tugann dochtúirí cógas dóibh a thugann faoiseamh dóibh ach nach leigheasann iad
result.html: tugann dochtúirí cógas dóibh a thugann faoiseamh dóibh ach nach leigheasann iadDoctors give them medicines which give them relief but do not cure them.
result.ponchtml: tugann doċtúirí cógas dóiḃ a ṫugann faoiseaṁ dóiḃ aċ naċ leiġeasann iadDoctors give them medicines which give them relief but do not cure them.
